snippet: The Knicks’ owner James L. Dolan may have tarnished the team’s image by recording on-court comments.
abstract: Analysis; New York Knicks owner James L Dolan may have tarnished the team's image by his ham-handed effort to record on-court comments by Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ owner James L. Dolan may have tarnished the team’s image by recording on-court comments.
